title: Boy, 9, with autism scared to go out after older kids beat him up and break toy
text:

A nine-year-old boy with autism has been left too terrified to play outside after he was beaten up almost a week ago.

Ryan Totten suffered facial injuries after being knocked to the floor and kicked in the head and face while playing in an alleyway outside his dad's house.

The group also broke a foam toy axe he had been playing with.

Mum, Zoe, said he has been left terrified bout playing outside after the attack, which occurred in Highfield, North Belfast, on October 10.

She said: “He was just out playing at the back of his dad’s house, right beside it.

“He was playing with a little toy and a few boys were walking along the alleyway and took it off him.

“They broke it, he tried to get it back, but they pushed him against the wall and he fell.

“When he fell they kicked him in the face and the head - that’s the only place they hit him.

(Image: Belfast Live)

“His face was swollen and bruised, he had a few lumps and bumps on his head and his lips were burst and swollen.”

The boys involved are thought to be around 12 or 13-years-old, reports Belfast Live .

Zoe said that Ryan has been unable to process what happened and has gone from playing outside every day to being “withdrawn”.

She added: “He has been totally shaken up. It’s affected him badly mentally.

“He hasn’t been out playing since. He’s at school but he’s withdrawn. Because he has autism he is struggling with processing the information. He can explain what happened but can’t explain how he feels.

“He would have been outside every single day. He wouldn’t be a child who’d sit inside and play the xBox.

“It’s hard as a mum because he’s really struggling to come to terms with it.”

The Police Service of Northern Ireland is appealing for any witnesses to come forward.

A spokesman said: “Were you in the Highburn Gardens area of North Belfast on Thursday 10th October at around 5pm?

“Police here at Tennent Street are appealing for witnesses in relation to an assault which occurred in that area - a nine-year-old was assaulted by a number of other youths in an alleyway.

“Can you help us and the victim? Can you identify the suspects? If you have any information - you can reach us by calling 101. The incident number is 1469 10/10/19.”
description: Ryan Totten suffered facial injuries after he was knocked to the floor and kicked in the head and face while playing in an alleyway outside his dad's house in Belfast
